backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing deployment and build-identifier related files with feature metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend source files to their descriptions for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/build-frontend.sh: Build script generating a timestamped build ID, installing deps, generating bindings, and building the frontend.
frontend/scripts/deploy.sh: Deployment script building the frontend, deploying canisters, and printing the resulting URL.
frontend/scripts/print-frontend-url.sh: Script that prints the frontend canister URL for either local or mainnet.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing section navigation and rendering the active section within MobileShell.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Utility providing build ID and formatted display text from Vite environment variables.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Layout wrapper adding background styling and a footer showing the build identifier.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Fixed bottom navigation bar for switching between About, Past Years, and Future Plans sections.
frontend/src/content/profileContent.ts: Static profile data module defining about, past years, and future plans content with TypeScript types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity authentication hook and provider handling login, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and sets light/dark OKLCH color variables, global styles, and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the About Me section with avatar, bio, highlights, and a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/sections/FuturePlansSection: Displays a list of future plans using cards and badges, with a fallback when no plans exist.
frontend/src/sections/PastYearsSection.t: Shows past experience entries in a card list with year labels and includes an empty-state fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, issues, and planned backend work for content persistence.
